name: KeePass 2.x Plugin
summary: Learn about .PLGX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: KeePass is an open-source, cross-platform password manager that allows users to store all their passwords in one encrypted database. Users can then view any of their passwords by entering the password used to encrypt their KeePass database.

PLGX files are plug-in files that add additional features to KeePass. For example, some PLGX files allow KeePass to automatically fill in your password when you visit a relevant website, so you do not have to manually copy and paste your password. Many PLGX files, as well as .EXE files used to install PLGX files, are available at keepass.info/plugins.html.

instructions: You can open a PLGX file in KeePass (cross-platform). To do so, open KeePass and select Tools → Plugins → Open Folder. When the Plugins folder appears, move your PLGX file to the folder. The next time you start KeePass, the program will load the plug-in your PLGX file contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
